solution_line_template: The number of laps per week is {laps_per_day} laps/day * {days_per_week} days/week = <<{laps_per_day}*{days_per_week}={laps_per_week}>>{laps_per_week} laps/week.
In five weeks, she swims {num_weeks} weeks * {laps_per_week} laps/week = <<{num_weeks}*{laps_per_week}={total_laps}>>{total_laps} laps.
